infotexts.entitydescription.itopride: A powerful vomitting supression drug. Also helps with nausea
infotexts.entitydescription.ipecac: A powerful drug which can be used to induce vomitting. Decreases itopride effects
infotexts.afflictiondescription.nausearesistance: Your conscience is oddly solid. For a while. Your chest stings...
